    "sql": "SET @SRID := 4326; SET @point := ST_GeomFromText('POINT(89.50249779176816 126.96600537699246)', @SRID); SET @polygon := ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((37.399190586836184 126.965669993654370,37.398563808320795 126.966005172597650,37.398563484045880 126.966005467513980,37.398563277873926 126.966005991634870,37.398563316804754 126.966006603730260,37.398687101343120 126.966426067601090,37.398687548434204 126.966426689671760,37.398687946717580 126.966426805810510,37.398688339525570 126.966426692691090,37.399344708725290 126.966027255005050,37.399344924786035 126.966026657464910,37.399344862437594 126.966026073608450,37.399285401380960 126.965848242476900,37.399284911074280 126.965847737879930,37.399284239833094 126.965847784502270,37.399260339325880 126.965861778579070,37.399191408765940 126.965670657332960,37.399191087858530 126.965670183150050,37.399190586836184 126.965669993654370))', @SRID); SELECT ST_Contains(@polygon, @point) as within_polygon;",

    "Root Cause Analysis": "The ST_Contains function may not be correctly handling geographic coordinate systems, leading to incorrect results."
}
